pages.text: 43|11|Ta cong tianshang jiangxia you dingliang de yushui, jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Nimen jianglai yao zheyang cong fenmu zhong bei quchu.
43|12|Ta chuangzao wan lei, er yi chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen qi cheng,

43|13|yibian nimen duan zuo zai shangmian. Ranhou, zai duan zuo de shihou, xiangzhe nimen de zhu de endian, bingqie shuo:“Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta wei women zhifu ci wu, women duiyu ta ben shi wuneng.
43|15|Tamen ba ta de yibufen puren, dang zuo tamen de fenzi; ren que shi mingxian de gu en zhe.
43|16|Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de zhongsheng zhong zi qu nu'er, er yi nan'er zhuan gui nimen ma?
43|17|Tamen wangyan zhiren zhu you nu'er, dan tamen zhong de yige ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lianse bian cheng andan de, erqie ta shi ao nu de.
43|18|Zai shoushi zhong chang da, qie buneng xiongbian zhe,(nandao tamen yi ta gui an la ma?)

43|19|Zhong tianshi ben shi an la de nupu, tamen que yi zhong tianshi wei nuxing. Tamen ceng jianzheng an la chuangzao tianshi ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu xialai, tamen ye jiang bei shenwen.
43|20|Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo zhiren zhu yiyu, women shi bu hui chongbai tamen de.” Tamen duiyu ci shuo, hao wu renshi; tamen zhishi shuohuang hua.
43|21|Nandao yiqian wo ceng ci tamen yi ben tian jing, er tamen shi jianchi na ben tian jing de.
43|22|Buran, tamen shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji er de zhengdao de.”
